text:
@sapphyreblayze maybe don't tweet about slash fic about irl slaves and their owners, idk. 

either way, the reaction was not as fucking over the top as people are saying and HER reaction is disgusting and pathetic. so tired of this shit lol. just apologize or admit you suck who cares!!!

@sapphyreblayze this is the best take on this so far lmao, the people who think the reaction to her tweet was over the top are just. ridiculous. most of what i saw was pretty thoughtful critique. some people dug up an old tweet of hers that was INSANELY terrible. oh well. it happens.
like imagine deactivating your account and then uploading a two hour response people because people... *checks notes*... disagreed with an opinion you had. go touch grass. i am begging.

like literally, no one was trying to fucking 'cancel' her, people literally just disagreed with ONE thing she said and responded to her explaining why they thought she was wrong. everyone, herself included, who acted like she'd been attacked by a 'cancel culture mob' is INSANE

people: *disagree with literally one tweet lindsay ellis made*

fucking lunatics on this website: https://t.co/KYUMObZrHc
